data.title: Sullivan County Volunteer Firefighter Opportunities
data.meta_description: Join the volunteer fire service in Sullivan County. Your local volunteer fire departments seeking new firefighters - serve your community, make new friends. Free training & benefits.
data.text:
Sullivan County

Volunteer Firefighter Opportunities

Find volunteer firefighter opportunities with fire departments in Sullivan County, New York. Browse the listings below and just reach out, or fill out our contact form on this page and a recruitment team member will be in touch.

Looking for a different county? Click here to search

NOT SURE WHERE TO START?

Learn More About Volunteer Opportunities

Name(Required)

First Last

Email(Required)

Enter Email Confirm Email

What County Are You Looking to Volunteer In?*(Required)

We’ll match your submission to nearby departments matching your volunteer interests.

Interested in a Specific Department? (Optional)

Please select a specific volunteer department(s) you are interested in learning more about.

Address(Required)

Street Address City State / Province / Region ZIP / Postal Code

Phone

I'm Interested In …(Required)

Firefighter

Firefighter / EMS

Live-In / College Bunkroom

Junior / Explorer Programs

Emergency Medical Services

Fire Corps

Admin, Support or Auxiliary

Briefly describe why you want to volunteer!*(Required)

Please also list any relevant Fire, EMS, work or non-profit experience (NOT required) . Feel free to ask any additional questions here, too.

Yes, I understand this is a volunteer (non-paid) opportunity.*

Yes
